message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCEAPI_EDITABLETREE_FV_STATUS_NO_ACTIVE
message.locale: An editable tree can only be created from an existing active tree on the case.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCEAPI_TREE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An evidence tree has already been created for this case.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCEAPI_EDITABLETREE_FV_STATUS_INVALID
message.locale: Only 'In Edit' or 'Active' trees should be specified.

message.name: INF_EVIDENCE_APPROVAL_REQUIRED
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s contains new evidence which requires approval.

message.name: INF_CASE_EVIDENCE_APPROVAL
message.locale: Evidence on case %1s of type %2s for %3s requires approval.
